channel.title: CVE Feed for Pelco -- Pelco Sarix Enhanced and Spectra Enhanced, Pelco Sarix Enhanced 1st generation and Spectra Enhanced PTZ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pelco -- Pelco Sarix Enhanced and Spectra Enhanced, Pelco Sarix Enhanced 1st generation and Spectra Enhanced PTZ

item.title: CVE-2018-7816|2024-08-05T06:37:59.196Z -- pelco -- pelco%20sarix%20enhanced%20and%20spectra%20enhanced%2C%20pelco%20sarix%20enhanced%201st%20generation%20and%20spectra%20enhanced%20ptz
item.description: A Permissions, Privileges, and Access Control vulnerability exists in the web-based GUI of the 1st Gen Pelco Sarix Enhanced Camera that could allow a remote attacker to delete an arbitrary file.
